title: Add new Admin Meet photos to GallerySection (September 21, 2025)

requirements.text: Update the GallerySection component (frontend/src/components/GallerySection.tsx) to replace the existing four Admin Meet gallery images with the four newly uploaded photos from the September 21, 2025 Admin Meet event. Save the new images as static assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/ with filenames: gallery-admin-meet-1.png, gallery-admin-meet-2.png, gallery-admin-meet-3.png, gallery-admin-meet-4.png. Display them in a responsive image grid inside an event card with the title 'एडमिन पैनल मीटिंग – 21 सितंबर 2025' and subtitle 'मुंबरा (ठाणे), महाराष्ट्र, भारत'. Retain the existing section heading 'गैलेरी' and decorative gold divider. Style consistently with the existing maroon/gold palette and card-based layout.
acceptanceCriteria: All four new uploaded photos (IMG_20250921_150644.jpg, IMG_20250921_150657.jpg, IMG_20250921_150653.jpg, IMG_20250921_133711.jpg) are saved as static assets and rendered in the GallerySection.
The event card displays the title 'एडमिन पैनल मीटिंग – 21 सितंबर 2025' and subtitle 'मुंबरा (ठाणे), महाराष्ट्र, भारत'.
The section heading 'गैलेरी' and decorative gold divider are retained.
The image grid is responsive and styled consistently with the maroon/gold palette.
No placeholder or old gallery images remain visible.

constraints: Do not modify any files listed in frontend.immutablePaths.
Images must be saved as static assets at frontend/public/assets/generated/ — do not route through the backend.
nonGoals: Adding new gallery events beyond the September 21, 2025 Admin Meet.
Modifying any other frontend section or component.

edits: Replace with uploaded photo of attendees seated indoors at Admin Meet event (IMG_20250921_150644.jpg > gallery-admin-meet-1.dim_1200x800.png)
Replace with uploaded photo of attendees seated indoors at Admin Meet event, wide angle (IMG_20250921_150657.jpg > gallery-admin-meet-2.dim_1200x800.png)
Replace with uploaded photo of large group of attendees in two rooms at Admin Meet event (IMG_20250921_150653.jpg > gallery-admin-meet-3.dim_1200x800.png)
Replace with uploaded photo of projector slide showing 'एडमिन पैनल मीटिंग गौसिया अशरफिया फाउंडेशन' with foundation logo (IMG_20250921_133711.jpg > gallery-admin-meet-4.dim_1200x800.png)
